mention.text: those guilty of the Odessa tragedy on May 2
People allegedly entrenched on the upper floors of the building
a fire that caused the death of such a large number of people

radicals supported and covered by current Kiev regime with full connivance of police who ousted federalisation supporters going out for a peaceful rally to the House of Trade Unions , blocked them there and set them on fire
radicals without hiding their faces are literally boasting of what they had done standing in front of the burning building and giving mocking comments on attempts of people
residents in southern and south-eastern regions
residents of southern and south-eastern regions
fascist actions of Right Sector radicals
the Ukrainian Black Sea port city of Odessa

football fans coming from the eastern Ukrainian city of Kharkov as well as Right Sector radicals and representatives of the so-called Maidan self-defence from Ukraine s capital , Kiev , who staged a march in Odessa streets
